text: Claude Lafortune (5 July 1936 – 19 April 2020) was a Canadian television host and artist. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. He had an exhibit dedicated to his work, Colle, papier, ciseaux, at the Musée des cultures du monde in Nicolet, Quebec. He hosted the children's television show Sol et Gobelet from 1968 to 1971. Lafortune died on 19 April 2020 in Longueuil, Quebec of COVID-19, aged 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Canada Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Canadian sculptors Category:Costume designers Category:People from Montreal
